title: Elminster's Ecologies Appendix I: The Battle of Bones, Hill of Lost Souls (Advanced Dungeons & Dragons, 2nd Ed, Forgotten Realms)
description: Between these covers are expansion booklets for the Elminster's Ecologies series, containing: * ecological features of The Battle of Lost Bones region, * the Hill of Lost Souls region, and * a complete set of encounter charts ~ These materials follow the same format as the original Elminster's Ecologies boxed set and mesh with it perfectly. Elminster himself has even thrown in a few personal notes. So read on, traveler, and learn all the secrets of these mysterious locales!
author: Scott    Davis
